Class Replicate

java.lang.Object
Replicate
public class Replicate extends Object
A set of hexagonal cells which replicate a painted area.
Version:
1.0 (30 August 2023)
Author:

    • Replicate

      public Replicate(int rows, int columns)
      Constructor of the replicate table with a random painted cell.
      Parameters:
      rows - is the number of rows of the board.
      columns - is the number of columns of the board.

    • Replicate

      public Replicate(int rows, int columns, int xPositionPainted, int yPositionPainted)
      Constructor of the replicate table with a given painted cell.
      Parameters:
      rows - is the number of rows of the board.
      columns - is the number of columns of the board.
      xPositionPainted - is the specific row of hexagon that will be paint.
      yPositionPainted - is the specific column of hexagon that will be paint.

  • Method Details

    • replicate

      public void replicate()
      In a sequence of discrete steps, each cell in the network simultaneously updates its state by examining its own state and those of its adjacent neighbors. If it counts an odd number of these neighboring cells that are full, the next state of the cell will be full; otherwise, it will be empty.

    • reflectHorizontal

      public void reflectHorizontal()
      Reflect horizontality the current board.

    • reflectVertical

      public void reflectVertical()
      Reflect verticaly the current board.
